results.name: Row sums of triangle K(m, n), inverse to triangle T(m,n) in A020921.
link: Temba Shonhiwa, A Generalization of the Euler and Jordan Totient Functions, Fib. Quart., 37 (1999), 67-76.
formula: Inverse binomial transform of tau(n) = A000005(n): Sum_{k=0..n} (-1)^(n-k)*binomial(n, k)*A000005(k). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Oct 29 2002
results.author: Temba Shonhiwa (Temba(AT)maths.uz.ac.zw)
